creditline: Gift of Yang and Helen H. Wang
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: portrait of a standing man wearing pink robes and a wide-brimmed straw hat, with a long beard, carrying a long stick; text in three areas at right and two areas at left; six red seals
dimension:
37 x 15 7/8 in. (93.98 x 40.32 cm) (image)
91 1/16 x 27 7/16 in. (231.3 x 69.69 cm) (overall, without roller)
title: Portrait of Su Shi
